channel.title: Features on Cloud Native Buildpacks
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Cloud Native Buildpacks

item.title: Dockerfiles
item.description: Dockerfiles can be used to extend base images for buildpacks builds.

item.title: Reproducibility
item.description:
Summary

The Cloud Native Buildpacks project aims to create “Reproducible Builds” of container images. For image creation commands (builder create, buildpack package, build) pack creates container images in a reproducible fashion. “Reproducible” is hard to define but we’ll do so by example and with a few caveats:

item.title: Software Bill of Materials
item.description: A Software Bill-of-Materials (SBoM) gives you a layer-by-layer view of what’s inside your container in a variety of formats.
